name: UAC Bypass Using .NET Code Profiler on MMC
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using .NET Code Profiler and mmc.exe DLL hijacking (UACMe 39)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:C\:\\Users\\* AND file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\pe386.dll)`
